ca.mcgill.hs.classifiers.location
Class MotionStateClusterer

java.lang.Object
  ca.mcgill.hs.classifiers.location.MotionStateClusterer

public class MotionStateClusterer
extends java.lang.Object

Uses modified DBScan clustering to determine the motion state given a sequence of observations.

Constructor Summary
MotionStateClusterer(LocationSet locations)
          Creates a new motion state clusterer for a given set of locations.
 
Method Summary
 void addObservation(double timestamp, Observation observation)
          Adds a new observation to the pool, does some clustering, and then returns the statuses of each point in the pool.

          Closes the clusterer and optionally writes statistics about the clustering.

          Returns the first available index in the distance matrix.
 java.lang.String getClusterStatus()
          Returns some clustering statistics

          Returns the window length in either seconds or samples, depending on the value of TIME_BASED_WINDOW.

          Returns the most recently assigned cluster id.

lastObservationWasMoving

public boolean lastObservationWasMoving()
Returns:
